newsitem.title: USA: Hovnanian sees 97 oper net similar to 96.
newsitem.headline: Hovnanian sees 97 oper net similar to 96.

text.p: Hovnanian Enterprises Inc reaffirmed Friday that it expects operating profits for fiscal 1997, prior to the impact of writeoffs and a change in interest capitalization, to be comparable to fiscal 1996.

It said the third and fourth quarters for the company are traditionally its best and expects these quarters once again to provide strong operating profits before non-cash charges for the full fiscal year.
The company earlier reported a second quarter and year-to-date loss after taking about $27.9 million in writeoffs.
